mapper.sql: menu_id, menu_name, parent_id, order_num, path, component, is_frame, menu_type, visible, status, permissions, icon, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark
mapper.select: select distinct menu_id, menu_name, parent_id, order_num, path, component, is_frame, menu_type, visible, status, permissions, icon from sys_menu where menu_type in ('M', 'C') and status = 0 order by parent_id, order_num

select distinct m.menu_id, m.menu_name, m.parent_id, m.order_num, m.path, m.component, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.visible, m.status, m.permissions, m.icon from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_role ro on rm.role_id = ro.role_id

select distinct m.permissions from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id where m.status = '0' and r.status = '0' and m.permissions is not null and ur.user_id = #{userId}
